title: True Ambition Looking for Top Laner

embed.description: The latest Tweets from #WeBleedPurple (@TrueAmBitionGG). International gaming organization with teams in GOW - HALO - SSB - COD-LOL!. WorldWide

body:
True Ambition is a well known international organisation and the LOL team is in need of a new top laner to replace a very important position in the team.
Requirements
- Must be on regularly
- Must turn up for practice 
- Have a positive attitude
If interested please fill this out in the comments section below
Rank = 
IGN = 
Best Champs = 
Days you will be available to play = 

I will add you in game if i am interested and we will negotiate from then
Thanks!

replies.body:
rank = b4
ign = Dunk Master RR
Best champs = Cho gath, Darius, Maokai, Shen, Jax, Renekton, I am proficient with almost every top laner.
Available every day

I know my rank seems bad, but i assure you its cause I spent my entire LoL career perfecting top lane, which last season (where I couldnt get top lane every game in solo q) was my biggest hinderer. I assure you, I can still dominate games when I play with my diamond friends in top lane.

Rank= S3
IGN = ChicknyGamin
Best Champs= Fiora, Malphite, Gnar and Ryze
Days/Time= I'm available 24/7 i never sleep and i have no life

Gday True Ambition, I'm interested in signing up
Rank = Platinum IV
IGN = TKNS Penguin
Best Champs = Gangplank, Malphite, Renekton, Shen, Darius
Days you will be available to play = Weekends, rest of school holidays
*Willing to be an emergency sub*
I dunt main top but i can learn <3

Rank = Challenger
IGN = TSM Loveboi
Best Champs = Love
Days you will be available to play = Love you
KappaRoss
IS THAT THE TSM LOVEBOI <3 Upvoting
